resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STRALARM ( NUM INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME TEXT, START_H INTEGER, START_M INTEGER, END_H INTEGER, END_M INTEGER, INTERVAL INTEGER )
insert into STRALARM(NAME , START_H , START_M , END_H , END_M , INTERVAL) values($name, $sh, $sm, $eh, $em, $intvl)
select * from STRALARM order by NUM desc limit 1
